content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE JDDataLake
WITH ( LOCATION = 'https://jddlgen2.blob.core.windows.net')

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'fsjd279/NYCTripSmall.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'JDDataLake1',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

    drop external data source JDDataLake1
